New Records: Jhonkensy Noel hit a game-tying, two-out, two-run home run in the ninth inning
David Fry hit a walk-off, two-out, two-run home run in the 10th inning
Key Match Events: The Guardians tied the game in the ninth inning after being down 5-3
Emmanuel Clase, the best closer in MLB, had a poor performance in the eighth inning
Andrés Giménez made a key defensive play to preserve the win
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Stephen Vogt praised the team's resilience and said 'That's exactly who we are'
Jhonkensy Noel downplayed the excitement and focused on the team's goal to reach the World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees struggled with base running and defensive miscues
The Guardians' defense was highlighted by Andrés Giménez's play
